dcterms:creator: Jan von der Assen

dcterms:description: A prototype of RansomAI that implements Deep Q-Learning and Isolation Forest, integrated into a real ransomware called Ransomware-PoC, which adapts its encryption behavior to evade detection.
dcterms:title: Ransomware-PoC

dcterms:description: A platform that monitors the radio frequency spectrum, used as a sensor in the experiments to evaluate the effectiveness of RansomAI.
dcterms:title: ElectroSense

dcterms:creator: P. M. S. Sánchez

dcterms:description: A survey that discusses various data sources, techniques, application scenarios, and datasets related to device behavior fingerprinting.
dcterms:title: Device Behavior Fingerprinting
